shortdesc.ph: Sets the whitelist of subscriptions for audio streams.

p.codeblock: virtual int setSubscribeAudioWhitelist(uid_t* uidList, int uidNumber) = 0;
public abstract int SetSubscribeAudioWhitelist(uint[] uidList, int uidNumber);

section.p: You can call this method to specify the audio streams of a user that you want to subscribe to.

ul.li: The whitelist is not affected by the setting in , and autoSubscribeAudio in .
Once the whitelist of subscriptions is set, it is effective even if you leave the current channel and rejoin the channel.

pd.p: The user ID list of users that you want to subscribe to.

If you want to specify the audio streams of a user for subscription, add the user ID in this list. If you want to remove a user from the whitelist, you need to call the method to update the user ID list; this means you only add the uid of users that you want to subscribe to in the new user ID list.

plentry.pd: The number of users in the user ID list.
